page.title: 04SURVEY OF FARMS IN AREA
page.content: {1) Cotswold Pig Development Company Minimal Disease Unit,Claxby.Unit to genetically improve three breeds of pig for breeding stock to commercial farmer for more economical meat production. Size-Approximately 250 pigs in completely sterile unit north of Claxby. {2) Moor Farm -}212 acres-Arable-let to farmer in neighbouring parish. {3) Claxby House Farm Acrege : 425 acres Crops: Wheat, barley, onions, carrots, oil seed rape and grass. Livestock: 300 pigs for fattening. Soil type: Clay - light sand. Problems: Wet land due to springs draining from hillside.
